name: Fire Dept 80
description:
A burning building, civilians are throwing themselves from the balconies and only your firemen team represents their only hope of survival.
Hurry to save the people with the canvas, accompanying them to emergency relief.
Experience this adrenaline-filled 80s revival, challenging your friends to beat your best scores, bounce after bounce!
Try the easy Game A and the harder Game B.
The incredible experience of diving back in the 80s while having fun with the exciting portable LCD game consoles. Graphics, sounds, visual effects are faithfully reproduced and designed to let you totally immerse yourself in the game.
Collect all the 'Back to the 80's' Games!
